gcci.text: The $3.23/hr H100 pricing reflects constrained supply chains and surging capex as enterprises race to secure AI compute capacity amid semiconductor shortages.

gtpi.text: At $1.25/1M tokens, aggressive API pricing wars are compressing margins while driving rapid efficiency gains through model optimization.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual load exposes critical grid strain and accelerates nuclear adoption discussions to sustainably power expanding AI infrastructure.

aipi.text: Contradictory signals of high hardware costs versus competitive token pricing suggest a maturing market balancing growth sustainability with margin pressures.
